tagline: Real-time management of ambulances, road issues, and citizen reports for efficient resource allocation.
problem: Admins struggle with manual tracking of road issues and ambulance management, leading to inefficiency and delays.
solution: A unified platform enabling admins to manage ambulances and road issues, with real-time data and citizen feedback for faster response.
targetUsers: Admin personnel managing road issues and ambulance dispatch; citizens who report road-related problems.
features: Real-time dashboard with statistics on issues, ambulances, and citizens
Citizens can report issues by uploading photos and descriptions
Admins can manage and resolve issues, assign ambulances, and track progress
tests: Manual testing on localhost (frontend UI + backend APIs)

metrics.current: Core features implemented and working locally

futureScope: Mobile App: Extend functionality for mobile users
Advanced Analytics: Implement predictive analytics to forecast issue trends
Offline Mode: Allow for limited functionality even without internet access
